e3201dca-427c-4f07-a457-90fd10a61728.description: The earners of the CPISI badge have a fundamental understanding of PCI DSS standards and the ability to implement them successfully in their business environment. They have developed a clear conception of the various requirements of PCI DSS and discovered the intent behind each requirement. The earners are able to make effective decisions for their compliance efforts and act against threats proactively.
e3201dca-427c-4f07-a457-90fd10a61728.name: Certified Payment Industry Security Implementer

alignments.name: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard
alignments.description: CPISI is an independent payments industry certification offered by SISA, adhering to Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS).

badge_template_activities.title: Recognize and implement core essentials of PCI DSS security controls. Attain a complete overview of 12 essential requirements to understand the concepts of the payment ecosystem. Discover and overcome the pain points in implementing PCI DSS standards, and learn from recent payment data breaches.
Complete the required 2-day PCI DSS implementation workshop. Achieve a passing grade of 60% or higher on the CPISI exam.

skills.name: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS)

16ee39b1-d97b-483e-a3f7-62b187fbbcdf.description: The earners of the CPISI Advanced badge have developed a thorough learning curve based on deep digital forensics, driven by real business cases, and elucidated using emerging payments forms. They have a strong understanding of best information security practices and controls mapping for PCI, ISO, NIST, SWIFT. The earners are able to leverage the regulatory changes to their advantage in payment security and gain practical insight into the payment security landscape.
16ee39b1-d97b-483e-a3f7-62b187fbbcdf.name: Certified Payment Industry Security Implementer (CPISI Advanced)

alignments.name: PCI DSS
alignments.description: Certified Payment Industry Security Implementer (CPISI Advanced) is an independent payments industry certification offered by SISA for payment security professionals, relating to the standards - PCI DSS, ISO 27001, NIST, SWIFT, and Regional Data Security Regulations (including Central Bank Regulations).

badge_template_activities.title: Develop a comprehensive, hybrid risk assessment approach towards Card Data, Payment and Transaction Flow, New Forms of Payments and Technology in Payment and Possible Security Threats. Achieve a complete overview of Payment Security Standards (PCI DSS, SWIFT CSF, Payment Security Guidelines from Central Banks, FFIEC). Acquire an in-depth breach analysis of data breaches."
Complete the required 2-day Advanced Payment Data Security Implementation workshop. Achieve a passing grade of 60% or higher on the CPISI 2.0 exam.
